page.title: 07School Life
page.content: At{Michael Syddall School}the children do a variety of school work.This includes work on interesting projects. The older pupils have recently been working on their{"Birmingham Project". We have established links with Somerville Primary School in Small Heath.The school is in central Birmingham and most of the pupils are from the Asian community.Pupils write to each other,and visit each other's school.In 1985 we had our first shared visit to a North Yorkshire Residential Field Centre. The school has a strong musical tradition with many children playing instruments.A{school orchestra}plays for assemblies each morning. Each year there is a Cross_Country Race for the Junior Boys and Girls. There are also Infant and Junior Sports Days.
